Package index

Generate code

The main functions of the package

construct() construct_multi()
Build code to recreate an object
construct_dput() construct_base()
Construct using only low level constructors
construct_clip()
Construct to clipboard
construct_dump()
Dump Constructed Code to a File
construct_reprex()
construct_reprex
construct_diff()
Display diff of object definitions
construct_signature()
Construct a function's signature
deparse_call()
Deparse a language object

Inspect problems related to code generation

construct_issues()
Show constructive issues

Global options

constructive-global_options constructive_opts_template constructive_pretty constructive_print_mode
Global Options

.cstr_repair_attributes()
